text: @SecBernhardt @PressSec @FBI Stuff it, half-wit! This is not a “national crisis” Americans are worried about, you boot-licker. Worry instead about 130,000 dead due to COVID-19 and the soldiers who faced great peril because their Commander in Chief was sucking up to Putin. The end tire administration = trash.
